summary: A coming-of-age comic tale about three eighteen-year-olds just out of high school who go to a Greek island following one of the boys' older girlfriend.
cast: Silvio Muccino|Violante Placido|Giuseppe Sanfelice|Elio Germano|Valeria Solarino|Enrico Silvestrin|Katy Louise Saunders|Myriam Catania|Paola Tiziana Cruciani|Alessia De Montis|Manuela Gatti|Jamil Hammoudi|Andrea Lehotska|Mauro Marchese|Dorotea Mercuri|Luis Molteni|Rocco Papaleo|Efi Papatheodorou|Pino Quartullo|Leonardo Santini|Eleonora Sergio|Tommaso Spinelli
title: Che ne sarà di noi
